alert.note: Alert for Bell; Falls; McLennan; Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 1:19AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central McLennan, central Milam, eastern Bell and Falls Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crawford to near Troy to 7 miles south of Rogers. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, Temple, Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, Lacy-Lakeview, Marlin, Cameron, McGregor, Beverly Hills, Lorena, Troy, Bruceville-Eddy, Rosebud, Rogers, Riesel, Lott, Golinda and Buckholts. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 309 and 346. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
